tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE compliance_monitoring (
    vendor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    regulatory_requirements BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    certifications VARCHAR(255),
    adherence_to_standards BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE Vendor (
     id INT PRIMARY KEY,
     name VARCHAR(50),
     location VARCHAR(100),
     certification VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Compliance (
     id INT PRIMARY KEY,
     vendor_id INT,
     standard_name VARCHAR(50),
     date_checked DATE,
     status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE RegulatoryRequirements (
     id INT PRIMARY KEY,
     requirement_name VARCHAR(50),
     description TEXT,
     category VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE VendorCompliance (
     id INT PRIMARY KEY,
     vendor_id INT,
     requirement_id INT,
     compliance_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE VendorCompliance (
    vendor_id INT,
    status_id INT,
    req_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES Vendor(vendor_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (status_id) REFERENCES ComplianceStatus(status_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (req_id) REFERENCES Requirements(req_id)
);
